nodes.text: The Cranan star-hopper was a type of starship. The Barbadelan pilot Karamu owned one such ship with his L-1g general purpose droid SV-3, but it was damaged when it crashed onto Rendel.

The Cranan star-hopper first appeared in a flashback section of the comic Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle 3, written by Cavan Scott, illustrated by Corin Howell, and published by IDW Publishing on October 17, 2018. On Twitter, Scott confirmed that the starship's name was a reference to the planet Cranan 12 in the text=Star Wars Legends continuity, first mentioned in "The Greel Wood Haven," an article written by Craig Robert Carey and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 6 in 1995.
